name: LAZY RAISE THE EARTH // demo
description:
LAZY RAISE THE EARTH
is a TRPG in development

soundtrack uses CC0 songs by Komiku
chezmonplaisir.bandcamp.com

current build is an IN-DEVELOPMENT DEMO
and may vary greatly from the final release

FREE DEMO
- 6 DEMO MAPS, playable in STORY or ARCADE modes
- import other players' custom maps (local .ini files)
- build EXP to customize heroes for use in ARCADE mode
- 10 available JOBS, 40+ available SKILLS
- full KEYBINDS, with xinput gamepad and limited legacy joystick support

$5 FUNDRAISER BUILD
- adds the ability to edit, create, and export custom maps
- 1 additional DEMO MAP, 2 additional JOBS
- counts as a pre-purchase (get the full game on release)
(does not have online sharing support!)
